presentationTable.name: Calculated Facts
presentationTable.description: Following folders contain various metrics directly calculated by OBIEE server.

presentationColumns.name: Actual Unit Price
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Actual Unit Price
presentationColumns.description: This logical object calculates the Actua Unit Price by dividing Revenue by Units.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Order Size
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Avg Order Size
presentationColumns.description: This logical object calculates the Actual Average Oder Size by dividing Total Revenue by number of Distinct Orders.

presentationColumns.name: # of Orders
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.# of Orders
presentationColumns.description: This metric counts the distinct number of orders in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

presentationColumns.name: # of Products with Orders
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.# of Products with Orders
presentationColumns.description: This metric counts the distinct number of Products in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

presentationColumns.name: # of Offices with Orders
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.# of Offices with Orders
presentationColumns.description: This metric counts the distinct number of orders in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

presentationColumns.name: Full Month Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Full Month Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the full month sum of revenue.

presentationColumns.name: Full Quarter Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Full Quarter Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the full quarter sum of revenue.

presentationColumns.name: All Offices Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.All Offices Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of revenue for all offices.

presentationColumns.name: All Products Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.All Products Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of revenue for all products.
